name: want some popcorn?
description:
A sequel to @Sagara 's game! 

I don't own any music asset in this project but I made all the art as an imitation of @Sagara 's game!

Thanks for playing this game!

steal popcorns from who sitting in front of u without being noticed

hold down the left mouse button to steal

you can try to do this in real life :)
